snippet.title: ARK: Extinction Expansion Pack Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
Finish your journey through the worlds of ARK in ‘Extinction’, where the story began and ends: on Earth itself! An Element-infested, ravaged planet filled with fantastical creatures both organic & technological, Earth holds both the secrets of the past and the keys to its salvation. As a veteran Survivor who has conquered all previous obstacles, your ultimate challenge awaits: can you defeat the gigantic roaming Titans which dominate the planet, and complete the ARK cycle to save Earth's future?

Music: Young Men Dead by The Black Angels.
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/young-men-dead/658014951?i=658014960

Available November 6th on Steam, November 13th on Xbox and PS4!

Steam on PC/Mac/Linux/SteamOS: https://store.steampowered.com/app/887380/ARK_Extinction__Expansion_Pack/

For the latest updates follow us on:

Twitter at https://www.twitter.com/survivetheark
Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/survivetheark/
Visit the Website: http://playark.com 
Community Hub: http://www.survivetheark.com
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/playark
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/survivetheark
Plus watch us tame and train leviathan creatures: https://www.twitch.tv/survivetheark
